org.apache.hama.graph

Class GraphJobMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.graph.GraphJobMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<GraphJobMessage>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<GraphJobMessage>

    public final class GraphJobMessage
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<GraphJobMessage>
    A message that is either MapWritable (for meta communication purposes) or a real message (vertex ID and value). It can be extended by adding flags, for example for a graph repair call.
